title: TFT Rolling Probability Calculator
disclaimer: This calculator is not affiliated with Riot Games, and is for informational purposes only. The odds and probabilities are based on the current shop odds and pool sizes, and are subject to change.
copiesOut: Number of copies of {unitName} out of pool
poolOut: Number of copies of {cost}-costs out of pool
probabilityChart: Probability of Getting At Least X Copies
goldFor2Star: Gold required for 80% chance of 2-star (3+ copies): {gold}
goldFor3Star: Gold required for 80% chance of 3-star (9+ copies): {gold}
